languages.text: Несомненный знаток зодчества Гордей Скатов не смог раздуть искру своего гения в пламя таланта. Снедаемый безумными догадками о тайнах станции Футфол, он впал в пристрастие к амасеку и деградировал до вызывающего жалость и брезгливость пьяницы. Скатов погиб при запуске отреставрированной канализационной системы Даргонуса ввиду допущенных им ошибок.

Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.
languages.original_text: Несомненный знаток зодчества Гордей Скатов не смог раздуть искру своего гения в пламя таланта. Снедаемый безумными догадками о тайнах станции Футфол, он впал в пристрастие к амасеку и деградировал до вызывающего жалость и брезгливость пьяницы. Скатов погиб при запуске отреставрированной канализационной системы Даргонуса ввиду допущенных им ошибок.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, unquestionably an expert on architecture, was not able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of a talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he got hooked on amasec and turned himself into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of the renovated sewerage system in Dargonus due to his own mistakes in construction.

languages.text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫，这位毋庸置疑的建筑专家始终未能够点燃他天才的火花，艺术之焰也始终未能绽放。他沉迷于对落脚港秘密的疯狂猜测，终日耽于美酒，变成了一个可怜又可憎的酒鬼。由于自己的设计失误，达戈努斯新排污系统发生了故障，他也被淹死在了污水之中。
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫，这位毋庸置疑的建筑专家始终未能够点燃他天才的火花，艺术之焰也始终未能绽放。他沉迷于对落脚港秘密的疯狂猜测，终日耽于美酒，变成了一个可怜又可憎的酒鬼。由于自己的设计失误，达戈努斯新排污系统发生了故障，他也被淹死在了污水之中。

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, fraglos ein Experte auf dem Gebiet der Architektur, konnte den Funken seines Genies nie zu einem Feuer des Talents entfachen. Er war besessen von wilden Spekulationen über die Geheimnisse der Station Footfall, sprach deutlich zu intensiv dem Amasec zu und verkam zu einem bemitleidenswerten, widerlichen Säufer. Er starb wegen seiner eigenen Konstruktionsfehler bei der Eröffnung des frisch renovierten Abwassersystems von Dargonus.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, fraglos ein Experte auf dem Gebiet der Architektur, konnte den Funken seines Genies nie zu einem Feuer des Talents entfachen. Er war besessen von wilden Spekulationen über die Geheimnisse der Station Footfall, sprach deutlich zu intensiv dem Amasec zu und verkam zu einem bemitleidenswerten, widerlichen Säufer. Er starb wegen seiner eigenen Konstruktionsfehler bei der Eröffnung des frisch renovierten Abwassersystems von Dargonus.

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, historien en architecture renommé, ne parvint jamais à tirer parti de son étincelle de génie. Obnubilé par des théories fantasques portant sur les secrets de Castel, il succomba à l'attrait de l'amasec et devint un misérable ivrogne. Il mourut durant l'inauguration du nouveau système d'assainissement de Dargonus, à cause de dysfonctionnements dont il était responsable.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, historien en architecture renommé, ne parvint jamais à tirer parti de son étincelle de génie. Obnubilé par des théories fantasques portant sur les secrets de Castel, il succomba à l'attrait de l'amasec et devint un misérable ivrogne. Il mourut durant l'inauguration du nouveau système d'assainissement de Dargonus, à cause de dysfonctionnements dont il était responsable.

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, un incuestionable experto en arquitectura, nunca consiguió avivar la chispa de su genio para convertirla en las llamas del talento. Consumido por sus especulaciones cada vez más absurdas sobre los secretos de la estación de Paso, se volvió adicto al amasec y se convirtió en un borracho patético e insufrible. Murió durante la puesta en marcha del sistema de alcantarillado renovado de Dargonus debido a sus propios errores de diseño.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, un incuestionable experto en arquitectura, nunca consiguió avivar la chispa de su genio para convertirla en las llamas del talento. Consumido por sus especulaciones cada vez más absurdas sobre los secretos de la estación de Paso, se volvió adicto al amasec y se convirtió en un borracho patético e insufrible. Murió durante la puesta en marcha del sistema de alcantarillado renovado de Dargonus debido a sus propios errores de diseño.

languages.text: ゴーディ・スカトフは、紛うことなき建築の達人だったが、輝かしい才能の火花を燃え盛らせることがついぞできなかった。フットフォール基地の秘密にまつわる放逸な憶測に飲まれた彼は、アマセック浸りとなり、哀れで忌まわしい大酒飲みに姿を変えた。彼はダルゴナスの革新的な新下水処理システムの落成式で、自らの設計ミスによって命を落とした。
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: ゴーディ・スカトフは、紛うことなき建築の達人だったが、輝かしい才能の火花を燃え盛らせることがついぞできなかった。フットフォール基地の秘密にまつわる放逸な憶測に飲まれた彼は、アマセック浸りとなり、哀れで忌まわしい大酒飲みに姿を変えた。彼はダルゴナスの革新的な新下水処理システムの落成式で、自らの設計ミスによって命を落とした。

languages.text: Mimari konusunda sual olunmaz bir uzman olan Gordei Skatov, dehasının kıvılcımını hiçbir zaman faaliyete dökmeyi başaramadı. Binliman İstasyonu'nun sırları hakkındaki çılgın spekülasyonlar onu tüketti, amasek bağımlısı oldu ve zavallı ve iğrenç bir alkoliğe dönüştü. Dargonus'un yeni restore edilmiş kanalizasyon sisteminin açılışında, kendi tasarım hataları nedeniyle öldü.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an unquestionable expert on architecture, was never able to kindle the spark of his genius into the flames of talent. Consumed by wild speculations about the secrets of Footfall Station, he became addicted to amasec and turned into a pitiful and loathsome drunkard. He died during the launch of Dargonus's newly renovated sewage system due to his own design errors.

traits.locale_text: Mimari konusunda sual olunmaz bir uzman olan Gordei Skatov, dehasının kıvılcımını hiçbir zaman faaliyete dökmeyi başaramadı. Binliman İstasyonu'nun sırları hakkındaki çılgın spekülasyonlar onu tüketti, amasek bağımlısı oldu ve zavallı ve iğrenç bir alkoliğe dönüştü. Dargonus'un yeni restore edilmiş kanalizasyon sisteminin açılışında, kendi tasarım hataları nedeniyle öldü.
